org.eclipse.mylyn.wikitext.core.parser
Class Attributes

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.mylyn.wikitext.core.parser.Attributes
Direct Known Subclasses:
HeadingAttributes, ImageAttributes, LinkAttributes, ListAttributes, QuoteAttributes, TableAttributes, TableCellAttributes, TableRowAttributes
public class Attributes
extends Object

Attributes for a markup element. Note that though there are many specialized subclasses of this class, they are optional.

Since:
1.0
Author:
David Green
See Also:
DocumentBuilder
